Uses of Class
aguiaj.cards.Card

  • Packages that use Card 
    Package Description
    aguiaj.cards
    This package contains classes/enums related to playing cards.

    • Uses of Card in aguiaj.cards

      Methods in aguiaj.cards that return Card 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card[] CardStack.allCards()
      Obtain all cards of the stack, ordered from the bottom-most to the top-most of card of the stack.
      static Card[] Card.allCards()
      Creates an array with all the cards.
      Card CardHand.get(int index)
      Obtains a card.
      Card CardStack.pick()
      Remove the top card of the stack.
      static Card Card.random()
      Obtains a random card.
      static Card[] Card.randomArray(int length)
      Creates an array with random cards.
      Card CardStack.topCard()
      Obtain the card that is on top of the stack.
      static Card Card.valueOf(Rank rank, Suit suit)
      Obtain a card given a rank and a suit.
      Methods in aguiaj.cards with parameters of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CardHand.add(Card card)
      Adds a card to the end of the card hand (right).
      void CardHand.addAt(Card card, int index)
      Adds a card at a specific index.
      boolean CardHand.contains(Card card)
      Boolean query to check if a card exists in the card hand.
      int CardHand.indexOf(Card card)
      Obtains the index of a given card in the hand.
      void CardStack.put(Card card)
      Put a card on top of the stack.
      Constructors in aguiaj.cards with parameters of type Card 
      Constructor and Description
      CardHand(Card[] cards)
      Constructs a card hand using the cards contained in the array cards.
